diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Meningothelial meningioma associated with von Hippel-Lindau disease
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of meningothelial meningioma was supported by the intraoperative findings and histologic examination revealing typical characteristics of meningioma. Additionally, the patient had a germline mutation of the VHL gene and loss of heterozygosity on chromosome 3p in the meningioma, indicating the tumor's association with VHL disease.
